ReadingPractice.Heading: Decide whether the following statements are true(T) or false(F).

Question.Ask: The construction of Van Mieu took place between 1076 and 1779.
Quoc Tu Giam is considered to be first university of Vietnam.
Thousands of talented men were trained in Quoc Tu Giam from the 11th to the 19th century.
Van Mieu has now lost most of its traditional Vietnamese architecture.
Festivals and examinations used to be held in Van Mieu – Quoc Tu Giam.
Visitors can still see some trees which have been in Van Mieu for a long time.
